title: Uncooled photodetectors for the 3-5 mu m spectral range based on III-V heterojunctions. .
abstract: The design, fabrication, and characterization of heterojunction photodiodes for room temperature operation in the mid-infrared (3–5 µm) spectral range is described. Devices appropriate for carbon dioxide detection have been developed and studied.
